import Accordion from 'react-bootstrap/Accordion'; import { useState } from 'react'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import item1 from '../../images/products/supplements-natural-antioxidants/omega3.jpg'; import item2 from '../../images/products/supplements-natural-antioxidants/spirulina-hawaiian.jpg'; import item3 from '../../images/products/supplements-natural-antioxidants/time-c500-with-rose-hip.jpg'; import BrainBoosters from './Supplements/BrainBoosters.js'; import NaturalAntiOxidants from './Supplements/NaturalAntiOxidants.js'; function Product () { /*For popup modal*/ const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); /*For menu navigation*/ const [isBB, setBB] = useState(true); const [isNAO, setNAO] = useState(false); const clickHandler = (message) => { if (message === 'BB') { setBB(true); setNAO(false); } else if (message === 'NAO') { setBB(false); setNAO(true); } else { setBB(false); setNAO(false); } } return ( <>

About the product

Improves immunity. For maintenance of health, prevention of coughs and colds. A convenient time-release formulation ensures maximum absorption and constant high level of Vitamin C in the body.

Pack size: 30 tablets

Product of: Italy

Only available in clinics and specialist centres
